title: Robert Damrauer Scholarship in Chemistry Endowment Fund
description: To provide scholarship support in the Department of Chemistry at the University of Colorado Denver, College of Liberal Arts & Sciences.
marketingContent: First preference is for undergraduate students in good standing who are in danger of dropping from the program due to an unforeseen circumstance. Second preference is for undergraduate students who have had to drop out of the program in the last five years due to an unforeseen circumstance and are now returning. Third preference is for undergraduate and graduate students who have demonstrated excellence in their chemistry studies and are planning to enter a Chemistry PhD program within a year.
